property.name: Rules
property.value: You may gain an action during each of your turns. At the start of each of your turns, roll a die to see what the action will be for that turn, and then decide whether to take it. On a 1, you may use the action only to install a card; on a 2 or 3, only to gain [1]; on a 4, 5, or 6, only to draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At least it won't be trying to get its family hired."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle Bel-Digmo Antibody into R&D when it is rezzed. When Runner accesses Bel-Digmo Antibody from R&D, do 1 Net damage, and Runner must show it to you.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Sentry-Black Ice-AP-Brainwipe

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 brain damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I can see clearly now my brain is gone."

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 2 Net damage for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside Bug Zapper. @ End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Try it for a month, and if it doesn't flatline anyone, send it back at our expense!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. When you rez Caryatid, you may pay [1], above the rez cost, to make it a code gate instead of a wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the form and twice the function of our previous model-the Galatea."

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onRez:Lose1Bit-isOptional-isCost$$ChooseKeyword{Code Gate}

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Black Ops-Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [9] and 1 Bad Publicity point.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We don't call them 'Black Ops' because they're immoral; we call them that because they put us in the black."

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: OnScore:Gain9Bits$$Gain1Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace1– If trace is successful, do 1 Net damage. Gain [2] when you rez Chihuahua.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Almost too cute to kick. Almost."

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program. @ Trash a program. @ Trash a program. @ End the run. @ End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: War is the continuation of business by other means.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay two times [X] when you play Corporate Guard® Temps, to gain an action during each of your next X turns. Forfeit the next [X] you gain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now do you see why they never bill in advance?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Corporate Headhunters successfully does damage, Runner's hand size is reduced by 1. [A]: Do 1 meat damage. Use this ability only if Runner is tagged.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He wasn't nuch of a security risk, but we flatlined him anyway."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A1B0G0T0:Inflict1MeatDamage-onOpponent-ifTagged1-isRequirement$$Lose1Hand Size-ofOpponent

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ For the remainder of the run, all further ice is encountered at +1 strength, unless Runner pays [2] while passing Coyote. Gain [3] when you rez Coyote.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: OnRez:Gain3Bits

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. When you rez Credit Blocks, you may pay [1], above the rez cost, to make it a wall instead of a sentry.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At the right frequency, the bull-and-bear pulse of a seasoned corp's financial curve will paralyze a sane mind."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [15].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Here's the balance sheet on our hidden accounts. I suggest we have Finance consolidate the newly decriminalized activities with the legitimate loan."

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Cybertech Think Tank before and after you rez it. Cybertech Think Tank advancement counter: Increase by 1 the meat damage dealt by another source.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner trashed any nodes during his or her last turn. Give Runner a tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The runner tried to crash the entire file structure, but the black-box routines on the login records held."

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. If Runner passes Datacomb, pay [1], or uninstall it and store it in HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Getting at the honey sometimes means taking a sting or two."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Sentry-Black Ice-AP-Brainwipe

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 brain damage. @ End the run. If Runner passes Death Yo-Yo, you may choose to uninstall it, store it in HQ, and gain [1].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is a trick I call 'walkin' the dog.'"

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Inflict1BrainDamage||A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{End the Run}||A0B0G0T0:UninstallMyself$$Gain1Bits

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may rez Department of Misinformation when Runner attempts to expose a card. [1]: Prevent a card from being exposed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm sorry, sir, the department you requested does not exist. Could I get your name and number and have them call you back?"

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{prevent a card from being exposed}

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 2 Net damage. @ End the run. Pay [X], above the rez cost, when you rez Digiconda. X is Digiconda's strength, and X cannot be greater than 6.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "See that lump? It's still digesting the data from the last weeflerunner icon it caught."

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 Net damage for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside Dog Pile. @ End the run. Dog Pile has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Doppelganger Antibody, you may pay [2] to give Runner a Doppelganger counter, even if Doppelganger is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses Doppelganger from the Archives. Each Doppelganger counter causes Runner to lose [1] at the start of each of his or her turns. Runner may take an action to pay [4] to remove a Doppelganger counter. If Doppelganger is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rez a piece of ice, at no cost. Put X Kludge counters on that piece of ice; X cannot be 0. At the start of each of your turns, remove a Kludge counter. Trash that piece of ice when the last Kludge counter is removed from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a card at random: Gain [2]. Use this ability only during a run. At the end of the run, return to the bank any of the [2] you did not spend.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You're the one who said, 'When times are tough, everyone has to chip in'!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Fetal AI, do 2 Net damage, even if it is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses Fetal AI from the Archives. If Fetal AI is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you. Runner must pay 2 to steal Fetal AI, in addition to any other costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Food Fight has one "@ End the run" subroutine for every [2] you pay, above the rez cost, when you rez it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Frack, Hans, end the run! It's the Food Fight!"

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onRez:RequestInt-div2$$Put1Subroutine:End the Run-perX-div2

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. When you rez Galatea, you may pay [1], above the rez cost, to make it a code gate instead of a wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She's stonewalling."

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onRez:Lose1Bit-isOptional-isCost$$ChooseKeyword{Code Gate}

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gatekeeper has one "@ End the run" subroutine for every [2] you pay, above the rez cost, when you rez it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The icon alone does most of the work for us."

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onRez:RequestInt-div2$$Put1Subroutine:End the Run-perX-div2

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance Government Contract before and after you rez it. Government Contract advancement counter: Gain [3]. Use these bits only to pay for installing or rezzing cards. When the turn ends, return to the bank any of the [3] you did not spend.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of course they won't notice if we skim a little off the top. We're dealing with the government here."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Rearrange the ice installed on this fort. Use this ability only at the start of a run on this data fort.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So you say that only a fool would install the Watchdog and Jack Attack inside the black ice? Why don't you run it anyway, just for kicks."

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trace X – If trace is successful, end the run, and Runner cannot make another run until Runner takes an action to pay [2]. Pay [X], above the rez cost, when you rez Homing Missile. X is Homing Missile 's strength and trace limit, and X cannot be greater than 8.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Trace1-perMarker{PlusOnePerm}-excludeDummy||A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{end the run}$$CreateDummy-onOpponent-doNotTrash-with1Homing Missile||A0B2G0T0:Remove1Homing Missile-onlyforDummy

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each rezzed piece of ice installed outside Hunting Pack, Hunting Pack has one subroutine as follows: "@ Trace 5– If trace is successful, give Runner a tag."

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 Net damage. [2]: Iceberg has one "@ End the run" subroutine for the present encounter. Use this ability only when Runner encounters Iceberg.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hidden mass of the Iceberg is a corp's bottom line.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: atTurnEnd:Remove999Subroutine:End the Run

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Inflict1NetDamage||A0B2G0T0:Put1Subroutine:End the Run||A0B0G0T0:Remove1Subroutine:End the Run-isCost$$SimplyAnnounce{End the Run}

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may advance LDL Traffic Analyzers before and after you rez it. You may rez LDL Traffic Analyzers during a trace attempt. LDL Traffic Analyzers advancement counter: Gain [5]. Use this ability only during a trace attempt. When the trace attempt ends, return to the bank any of the [5] you did not spend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Lesley Major only in a subsidiary data fort. [5]: Add two advancement counters, at no cost, to a card installed in this data fort. Use this ability only when Runner passes the last piece of ice on this fort, and only once per run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. When you rez Lesser Arcana, you may pay [1], above the rez cost, to make it a wall instead of a sentry.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You'd think a hammer would blow through a wall of cards without even slowing down."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1], Discard a card at random: Repeat one subroutine on a piece of ice on this fort, until the end of the run. Treat the copy of the subroutine as if it appeared immediately after the original subroutine. Use this ability only during a run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What do you mean she dumped secret plans for world domination? Somebody's got to unplug that witch!"

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:Discard1Card-isCost$$SimplyAnnounce{repeat a subroutine on target Ice}

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner attempted a run during his or her last turn. Trace 6– If trace is successful, give Runner one tag for each point by which your trace exceeded his or her link.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I want his friends dead! I want his family dead! I want his deck dead!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2], Trash the top two cards stored in R&D: Repeat one subroutine on a piece of ice on this fort, until the end of the run. Treat the copy of the subroutine as if it appeared immediately after the original subroutine. Use this ability only during a run.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B2G0T0:Draw2Cards-toTrash$$SimplyAnnounce{repeat a subroutine on target Ice}

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program. @ End the run. If Runner passes Marionette, pay [1], or uninstall it and store it in HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Marionette's not such a big deal; it's who's pulling the strings."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:TrashTarget-Targeted-atProgram||A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{end the run}||A0B0G0T0:Lose1Bits-isCost||A0B0G0T0:UninstallMyself

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops-Ambush

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Marked Accounts, give Runner a tag, even if it is not installed. If Marked Accounts is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First Eurobank called, reporting a failed credit transfer from one of our marked funds. They're giving us the perp's address." "Good. So which fund was broken into?" "Heh. Get this: 'Counterintrusion Disbursements.'"

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Sentry-Black Ice-AP-Zombie

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 brain damage for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside Mastermind. @ End the run. Mastermind has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside it.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Inflict1BrainDamage-perTargetIce-Targeted-atIce||A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{end the run}||A0B0G0T0:Put1PlusOnePerm

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each rezzed code gate or wall installed outside Minotaur, Minotaur has one "@ End the run" subroutine.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Put1Subroutine:End the Run

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run unless Runner pays [1]. Gain [3] when you rez Misleading Access Menus.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wouldn't believe how many suckers try to access 'Tools/Certain Death.'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Do 1 Net damage. @ End the run. [1]: Move Mobile Barricade and insert it in a different position on this data fort. Use this ability only at the start of a run on this data fort. You may use this ability even if Mobile Barricade is unrezzed, in which case, you reveal it.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Inflict1NetDamage||A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{end the run}||A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{move it to a different position in this data fort}-onAccess

property.name: Rules
property.value: The difficulty of Gray Ops agendas installed in this fort is reduced by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The LANs and WANs of the late 20th century gave way to SWANs (Super-Wide-Area Networks), which were as graceful at data relay as their acronym suggested.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of a run on this fort, Runner must announce the number of bits he or she will spend during the run. Runner cannot spend more than this during that run. If Runner does not spend that many bits during that run, the Runner loses the remainder once the run is complete. You may rez Obfuscated Fortress at the start of a run on this fort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Panic Button only in HQ. [1]: Draw a card. Use this ability only during a run on HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As a last resort, I'm trying something I learned from Marketing: bombard him with sexy options and chances are he'll choose something he doesn't need."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Pattel Antibody, you may pay [3] to put a Pattel counter on all installed icebreakers, even if Pattel Antibody is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses Pattel Antibody from the Archives. Each Pattel counter on an icebreaker reduces its strength by 1. If Pattel Antibody is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B3G0T0:Put1Pattel Antibody-Targeted-atIcebreaker-onAccess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Pavit only in a subsidiary data fort. When you rez Pavit Bharat, uninstall all cards installed in this fort and store them in HQ. Install an equal number of cards from HQ in this fort. Rez Pavit Bharat only when Runner has passed the last piece of ice on this fort.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pavit" means "pious" -but hey, it's not like any parents predict their kid will grow up to be a ruthless security agent.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each 1 damage you successfully do, you may choose instead to prevent that damage and put a PDCAcounter on Please Don 't Choke Anyone. PDCA counter: Gain an action. Use this ability only once per turn and only during your turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "First, let's consider the problem not as a series of independent actions, Bob, But as a series... Oh lord, just kill him."

property.name: Rules
property.value: For every three advancement counters over Project Venice 's difficulty that are on Project Venice when you score it, gain an action during each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Attention all substations: Project Venice has crashed again due to server difficulties. Please observe safety precautions while unplugging any programmers or corprunners."

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onScore:Gain1Max Action-perMarker{Advance}-ignore4-div3

property.name: Rules
property.value: For every two advancement counters over Project Zurich 's difficulty that are on Project Zurich when you score it, gain [1] at the start of each of your turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With only minor deviation from standard accounting practices, we can improve our bottom line significantly."

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onScore:Put1Project Zurich-perMarker{Advance}-ignore3-div2||atTurnStart:Gain1Bits-perMarker{Project Zurich}

property.name: Rules
property.value: After Runner passes each piece of ice on this fort, Runner must pay [1] or end the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fifty for the Shotgun Wire, twenty to get past the Filter-even the Hellhound wanted a cool three hundred! That place is worse than a third-world bureaucracy! We should seriously rethink their merger proposal." -Erin Devlin, WuTech COO

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Raymond Ellison only in a subsidiary data fort. [T]: Remove any number of advancement counters from cards installed in this data fort. Gain [3] for each advancement counter removed. Use this ability only during a run. At the end of the run, return to the bank any of the bits gained that you did not spend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rez a piece of ice, at no cost. Put on that ice a number of Term counters equal to its rez cost. At the start of each of your turns, if you have at least [2], lose [2] and remove one of these Term counters; otherwise, put a Term counter on that piece of ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The difficulty of research agendas installed in this fort is reduced by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I want this Proteus ice tested by dawn." "But, Dr. Kordite, it's already dawn." "Do you think anyone in R&D knows that?"

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2]: Riddler has one "Subroutine End the run" "@ for the present encounter. Use this ability only when Runner encounters Riddler.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why is a raven like a write-protect?"

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B2G0T0:Put1Subroutine:End the Run||A0B0G0T0:Remove1Subroutine:End the Run-isCost$$SimplyAnnounce{End the Run}

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Random

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. When Runner encounters Roadblock, roll a die. On a 6, derez Roadblock, and Runner automatically passes it; otherwise, add the result to Roadblock's strength for that encounter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you have any stolen data to declare?"

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Roll1Dice$$Put1PlusOne-perX||A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{end the run}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sandstorm has one "@ End the run" subroutine for every [2] you pay, above the rez cost, when you rez it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like a snow crash, only much grittier."

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onRez:RequestInt-div2$$Put1Subroutine:End the Run-perX-div2

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. If Runner passes Scaffolding, you may choose to uninstall it, store it in HQ, and gain [1].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Usually it's not the scaffolding that's the problem but whatever it is they're repairing on the other side."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{End the Run}||A0B0G0T0:UninstallMyself$$Gain1Bits

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner has attempted a run this game. Trace 3– If trace is successful, give Runner a tag. Pay [1], in addition to the normal cost, for each point of trace above 0.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The mark lives in a city that lets wild dogs run around as a way of curbing the homeless presence, and these puppies will blend right in."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install Simon Francisco only in R&D or HQ. During a run in which Simon Francisco is accessed, Runner accesses one less card stored in this fort.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No, no, we don't have enforcers here at Futokora. You must've met one of our customer service reps."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Rez Siren when you install it. Install Siren only if you can pay to rez it. [1]: If possible, Runner must make a run on the fort Siren is installed in, instead of on the fort he or she was originally going to make a run on. Use this ability only at the start of a run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They'll come. Just leak one word: 'oops.'" -Magnificent Curtis

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{redirect the run to this data fort}

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run unless Runner pays [1]. Gain [3] when you rez Snowbank.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure you can jump right through, but let me tell you a story about a kid on my street who jumped off his fire escape into a snowbank..."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. When you rez Sphinx 2006, you may pay [4], above the rez cost, to make it a sentry instead of a code gate

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What runs on four megs in the morning, two megs in the afternoon, and three megs in the evening?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Runner accesses Stereogram Antibody from the Archives, do 1 Net damage and shuffle Stereogram Antibody into R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't focus on it! Just let your desk's interface routines save you the headache... and the nosebleed from the feedback."

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. When you rez Sumo 2008, you may pay [1], above the rez cost, to make it a wall instead of a sentry.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see the kanji characters on his belt translate to 'wide load.'" "Plus, if you look real close, you can see I coded a smiley face in his navel."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [A]: Trash a rezzed piece of ice. Gain [4].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let me get this straight: you ran the databacks of Syd Meyer Superstores with a 'breaker you bought at Syd's? Congrats, you just participated in their standard product-test program."

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. @ End the run. @ End the run. @ End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's so tough you can't even think about breaking it.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{end the run}

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. If Runner passes Tumblers, you may choose to uninstall it, store it in HQ, and gain [1].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're not pistons. They just put the flattened icon in as a sick joke."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{End the Run}||A0B0G0T0:UninstallMyself$$Gain1Bits

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. If Runner passes Twisty Passages, pay [1], or uninstall it and store it in HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's got routines that specifically target Smarteye; the eyeball becomes a little eight ball that says, "You see a little file here. Do you want to go (n)orth or(s)outh?"

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{end the run}||A0B0G0T0:Lose1Bits-isCost||A0B0G0T0:UninstallMyself

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Gray Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if Runner installed any resources during his or her last turn. Trace 4– If trace is successful, trash a resource Runner installed during his or her last turn and give Runner a tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Everybody knows somebody who knows a little too much about anybody.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you score Breeding Ground, trash all cards installed in or on the fort Breeding Ground was installed in. When Runner accesses Breeding Ground, choose up to two programs for each advancement counter on Breeding Ground; Runner brings those programs into his or her hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ End the run. [1]: Move Walking Wall and insert it in a different position on this data fort. Use this ability only at the start of a run on this data fort. You may use this ability even if Walking Wall is unrezzed, in which case, you reveal it.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{end the run}||A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{move it to a different position in this data fort}-onAccess

property.name: Rules
property.value: @ Trash a program unless Runner pays [1]. Gain [3] when you rez Washed-Up Solo Construct.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Before they made my construct, they told me, 'You're getting too slow for street work, but we can transfer you into software security.' How was I to know?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: The difficulty of Black Ops agendas installed in this fort is reduced by 1.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Black Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: Score an additional 4 agenda points when you score World Domination.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So, Wilson, how in the frack did you know the fileset was secret plans for world domination?" "'Cause it was labeled 'Secret Plans for World Domination.'"

property.name: Artist
property.value: onScore:Gain4Agenda Points

property.name: Rules
property.value: [5], [T]: Search your stack for a program, and install that program, if you can. Shuffle your stack afterwards. You may use this ability during an encounter with a piece of ice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, access three additional cards from HQ. You cannot use noisy icebreakers during the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now who called this meeting?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each successful run on R&D, you may choose to give the Corp a Doom counter instead of accessing cards from R&D. Each Doom counter forces the Corp to roll a die whenever it installs a card. On a 6, the card is trashed after it is installed, and the Corp removes a Doom counter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who's up for another Deathmatch 2020?"

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Hidden-Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: [3], [T]: Cancel the effect of a successful trace. Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point if the trace would have had an effect other than or in addition to giving you any tags.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B3G0T1:SimplyAnnounce{cancel the effects of the trace}

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Base Link

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Base link 2. [3]: +1 link. Gain [1] whenever you successfully use Back Door to Rivals to avoid a trace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some corp just smashed into Iron Willie's place and busted him up real bad." "No kidding. Hunh."

property.name: Rules
property.value: After the turn in which you install Viacox, you gain an action during each of your turns, which you must take if possible. Roll a die at the start of each of your turns to find out what the action is. On a 1, draw a card. On a 2, gain [1]. On a 3, make a run on R&D. On a 4, make a run on HQ. On a 5, make a run on a subsidiary data fort. On a 6, reveal a card to the Corp at random from your hand, and play or install that card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [6]: Break up to five sentry subroutines on a single piece of ice. [1]: +1 strength

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Does that have to be your solution to everything?" "Well... yes, now stand back."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B6G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break up to five sentry subroutines}||A0B1G0T0:Put1PlusOne

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break sentry subroutine. [2]: +1 strength Choose an installed piece of ice when you install Black Widow. Black Widow gets +5 strength during each encounter with that piece of ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When she pours on the charm, a piece of ice falls hard."

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onInstall:Put1Black Widow-Targeted-atIce

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break sentry subroutine}||A0B2G0T0:Put1PlusOne

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, do not access cards from HQ; instead, score 1 agenda point.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "... only if you fork over the negatives too, chombatta."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T1:Gain1Agenda Points

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Prevent 2 meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Over there!" BRRRRRRT! "Take out that wall!" Tink, tink, WHUMPF! "Okay, looks clear." ("Whew!") "Did you hear something?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2]: Break wall subroutine. [1]: +1 strength

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An effective drill, but pretty dull."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B2G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break wall subroutine}||A0B1G0T0:Put1PlusOne

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break wall subroutine. [2]: +1 strength. If Bulldozer breaks all the subroutines of a wall, and the next piece of ice encountered during this run is a sentry, break one of the subroutines of that sentry, at no cost. Whenever you break a wall subroutine with Bulldozer, lose a total of [2] from stealth cards.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break wall subroutine}||A0B2G0T0:Put1PlusOne

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1], [T]: Gain [4]. You may use this ability whenever you pay any cost or penalty.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We keep your money safe from prying eyes." -Chiba Mutual prospectus, edited draft for English-speaking investors

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break wall subroutine. [1]: +1 strength

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes all it takes is a little drip to make a big hole.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break wall subroutine}||A0B1G0T0:Put1PlusOne

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +2 MU and +2 hand size. Put [2] from the bank on Cortical Cybermodem when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for using icebreakers during runs. If you use any of these bits, replace them from the bank at the start of your next turn.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: whileRezzed:Gain2MU$$Gain2Hand Size$$Put2Bits||whileRezzed:Reduce#CostUse-forIcebreaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevents 1 Net or brain damage each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Damn but those Zombies make your head itch!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: The Corp loses [3]. Use this ability immediately after a successful run on HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What happened to that guy who used to clean the fish tanks?" "He had a family emergency in Crystal Palace right after that screw-up in Finance."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [1] and draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Back home on the bayou, before it dried up, the good ole boys would ambush federal patrolmen just to try out their new cyberware. Now we bushwhack stray Netwatch goons just to try out our new programs. Some things just don't go out of style." -Digital Dana

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Crumble counter. Two or more Crumble counters allow you trash, at no cost, any cards accessed from HQ, even if the cards cannot normally be trashed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Trash, at no cost, all cards installed in a subsidiary data fort, even if they cannot normally be trashed. Use this ability only when you have just successfully made a run on that fort, and before accessing cards from that fort.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They drop rocks; I commandeer battlesats."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. Whenever you approach an unrezzed piece of ice during that run, expose it. You may jack out before the Corp decides whether to rez the ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Neat piece of code. Reminds me of a weef I used to know."-Max Forward

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. If run is successful, do not access cards; instead, trash all rezzed ice on the fort on which you just made a run, and the Corp gives you three tags.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure it was worth it. Now hurry up and get packed; they'll be here any minute."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. After passing a piece of ice during this run, you may derez that ice and end your run if you broke all the subroutines of that ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even if they catch me doing this, they'll have me inproving their ice to the bitter end. Of course, I'd rather that end not be strapped to a couch in Skälderviken."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2]: Derez a piece of ice and end your run. Use this ability only when you have just broken all the subroutines of that piece of ice and have successfully passed it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every time Dahlia laid out a sentry, I'd hand her Disintegrator and say: 'You do the honors.' But that got old in a hurry."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [9] and the Corp gives you a tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure you won't stay? No one else here understands our business half as well as you do."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Prevent up to 2 Net damage. [1]: Prevent 1 brain damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I know I always feel more enterprising when my shields are up." -Advert

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put [2] from the bank on Spin Chip when it is installed. Spin Chip can have an icebreaker installed in it whose MU cost is no greater than 1. Use the bits on Spin Chip only to pay for using this icebreaker during runs. If you use any of these bits, replace them from the bank at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1], [T]: Avoid receiving a tag.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm an only child... now."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point. Take 2 brain damage. This damage cannot be prevented.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I won't need much air with the coma drug, but I could still get hypoxia if you don't get me out of the bog on time"

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onPlay:Gain1Bad Publicity-onOpponent$$Inflict2BrainDamage-nonPreventable

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break sentry subroutine. At the start of each run, roll a die and add the result to Legacy 's strength for that run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forward was a good runner, but wandered a little too close to the edge...

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break sentry subroutine}||A0B0G0T0:Roll1Dice$$Put1PlusOne-perX

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on both HQ and R&D this turn. Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point. Give the Corp 1 additional Bad Publicity point if you liberated or trashed any Black Ops cards during those runs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "But we weren't going to do that til next week!"

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onPlay:Gain1Bad Publicity-onOpponent

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break a subroutine of the type chosen for Fubar. [2]: +1 strength. [0]: Choose whether Fubar breaks code gates, sentries, or walls. Use this ability only once. Whenever you break an ice subroutine with Fubar, lose [1] from a stealth card.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break subroutine}||A0B2G0T0:Put1PlusOne||A0B0G0T0:ChooseKeyword{Code Gate Breaker|Wall Breaker|Sentry Breaker}

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each successful run on R&D, give the Corp a Garbage counter. Two or more Garbage counters allow you to trash, at no cost, any cards accessed from R&D, even if the cards cannot normally be trashed. The Corp loses two Garbage counters after any run during which this ability is used.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: The Corp discards two cards at random from HQ. Use this ability only when the Corp successfully does meat damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each successful run on R&D, give the Corp a Highlighter counter. Each Highlighter counter after the first allows you to access an additional card from R&D whenever you access cards from R&D.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install a program or a piece of hardware. Gain [3], which you may use only to pay for its installation cost. Return to the bank any of the [3] you did not spend.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Real cute. The perps added 'One driver, bound and gagged' to the end of the shipping manifest."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [4], [T]: Access two additional cards from HQ. Use this ability only when accessing cards from HQ.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've got low friends in high places."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B4G0T1:SimplyAnnounce{access two additional cards from HQ}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Expose up to five cards installed in or on a single data fort.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Max Forward is a freelance writer and netrunner, and has recently made available to the runner community the icebreaker technology he describes." -contributor's bio

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Do not play Identity Donor as an action; instead, play it during the Corp 's turn when you would suffer meat damage. Prevent that meat damage and give the Corp 2 Bad Publicity points.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onPlay:Put100protectionMeatDMG$$Gain2Bad Publicity-onOpponent

property.name: Rules
property.value: [7], [T]: Gain [11]. You may use this ability whenever you pay any cost or penalty.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Honey, are you forgetting to record your credit card transfers again?"

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. If run is successful, the Corp gives you two tags, and you give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point for each black ice you encountered during the run, 1 for each Black Ops card the Corp rezzed during the run, and 1 for each Black Ops agenda you liberated during the run.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Gain2Tags$$Gain1Bad Publicity-onOpponent-perTargetBlack Ops

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Give one of your icebreakers +2 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during an encounter with a piece of ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yeah, but it's a little bit too loyal; it just doesn't know when to get out of my way."

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of each of your turns, if there are two Drip counters on Drip Feed, remove all Drip counters from it and take 1 brain damage, which cannot be prevented; otherwise, put a Drip counter on Drip Feed and gain an action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By the time he jacked out, his girlfriend had left him, and the dog was dead."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [4], [T]: Trash, at no cost, one or more cards that you are currently accessing, even if those cards cannot normally be trashed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now, remember to place the charges exactly where I tell you this time."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2]: Break a subroutine of the type last chosen for Morphing Tool. [1]: +1 strength. [1], A: Choose whether Morphing Tool breaks code gates, sentries, or walls. When you install Morphing Tool, choose whether it breaks code gates, sentries, or walls.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onInstall:ChooseKeyword{Code Gate Breaker|Wall Breaker|Sentry Breaker}

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B2G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break subroutine}||A0B1G0T0:Put1PlusOne||A0B1G0T0:ChooseKeyword{Code Gate Breaker|Wall Breaker|Sentry Breaker}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [8] if you trashed an advertisement card this turn, or gain [6] if you trashed a transactions card this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He was a nobody until I doctored their auditions database. I rigged that campaign to fail, of course, But it lasted long enough for him to get paid."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on each data fort. Score 1 agenda point if all the runs are successful. Forgo your next action if any of the runs are not successful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's scary how ineffective the law is these days. It used to be that we could turn corporate dirt over to the Feds, and let them do the rest of the network. Nowadyas we have to do everything ourselves" -Digital Dana

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Gain1Agenda Points

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you have at least two connections in play. Trash two connections. Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Canadian Mountain Spring Water? That song's for the tourists. You just bought tap water, man!" "PFFFFFT!"

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: onPlay:TrashMulti-Targeted-atConnection-byMe$$Gain1Bad Publicity-onOpponent

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time you access an agenda this turn, gain [6].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Maybe you and I could-" "Keep it simple, stupid."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Corp cannot create any new data forts. The Corp may trash Precision Bribery by taking an action to pay [4]. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time you access an agenda this turn, score 1 additional agenda point.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ishiguro apologizes for doubting your ability to find data incriminating our competitor. He humbly offers this unworthy gift for uncovering highly sensitive plans for world domination."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T1:Gain1Agenda Points-onlyforDummy

property.name: Rules
property.value: [4], [T]: Access two additional cards from R&D. Use this ability only when accessing cards from R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry–you'll have the time. The new game on the system will keep them distracted for hours."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B4G0T1:SimplyAnnounce{access two additional cards from R&D}

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. Whenever the Corp rezzes a card during that run, gain [1].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We'll put a top on your line and transfer credit after each piece of ice you hit. Oh, and don't worry, even if surge ice fries you, our buffers will ensure the data reaches us safely."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [1]: Break up to two sentry subroutines on a single piece of ice. [3]: +1 strength

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've wanted to name a Killer this ever since my SATs went out claiming to schools that I planned to become an interior decorator."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B1G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break two sentry subroutines}||A0B3G0T0:Put1PlusOne

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if you made a successful run on a data fort this turn. Trash all rezzed ice on that fort, and the Corp gives you three tags.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It takes a long time-hundreds of milliseconds-to feed all the ice specs to the planted viruses, so you'd better be riding a Nasuko cycle through the fourth dimension, because the Corp has your number!

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Base Link-Position

property.name: Rules
property.value: [2]: Base link 4. [2]: +1 link. Gain [1] whenever you successfully use Runner Sensei to avoid a trace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on R&D. If run is successful, access three additional cards from R&D. You cannot use noisy icebreakers during the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sure there are more signals to hide in, but there's also a greater chance of someone being around who'll jump you if you get noticed."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T1:SimplyAnnounce{access three additional cards from R&D}

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Virus-Bad Publicity-Random

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Scaldan counter. Each Scaldan counter forces the Corp to roll a die at the start of each of its turns. On a 5 or a 6, the Corp gains 1 Bad Publicity point.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Play only if the Corp rezzed a piece of Black Ice this turn. The Corp either derezzes that piece of ice or receives 2 Bad Publicity points.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Pass a piece of AP ice. You may use this ability during an encounter with a piece of ice.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T1:SimplyAnnounce{pass a black ice}

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break code gate subroutine. [3]: +4 strength

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I'd rather have bare bones working for me than an army of muscle." -Max Forward

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break code gate subroutine}||A0B3G0T0:Put4PlusOne

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trash: Prevent any amount of Net or brain damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just the superficial sort of icon that someone grounded too far in 'reality' would think up. TURN UP THE FEED, YOU WIGGLY MEAT THINGS! THIS IS THE NET! NOTHING'S REAL! YOU HAVE NO HEAD!" -Rache Bartmoss

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain [2] and draw one card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is reconnaissance, not voyeurism, Wilson."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Take [1] from Streetware Distributor, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns. [A]: Put [3] from the bank on Streetware Distributor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Way it works is, you choose an object off the shelf, and I give you the download key when you pay. Or you shoplift it, and it downloads automatically... with the complimentary virus option."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Bad Publicity

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point for each advertisement you trash during the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'SFX'! It says. 'SFX'!"

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Gain1Bad Publicity-onOpponent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provides +1 MU and +1 hand size. Put [1] from the bank on Cranial Interface when it is installed. Use this bit only to pay for using icebreakers during runs, but not for using noisy icebreakers. If you use the bit, replace it from the bank at the start of your next turn.

property.name: AutoScript
property.value: whileRezzed:Gain1MU$$Gain1Hand Size$$Put1Bits||atTurnStart:Refill1Bits||whileRezzed:Reduce#CostUse-forIcebreaker-notNoisy

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may use the following abilities whenever you pay any cost or penalty. [T]: Gain [2]. [3], [T]: Gain [6].

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Tax counter. Every two Tax counters cause the Corp to lose [1] at the start of each of its turns.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The virus just alters their data. The actual damage is done by government auditors." -Spider Murphy

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your stack for a program, and install it, at no cost. Shuffle your stack. If you install a program in this way, make a run. After the run, shuffle the program into your stack, unless it is no longer in play, in which case, lose [4] plus its installation cost. If this is more than the number of bits in your pool, suffer the difference in meat damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And when you bring it back, we'll deactivate the code bomb for free."

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deck-Base Link

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Base link 5. [1]: +1 link. Provides +1 MU.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "...oh and I'll also need a '20 Moebius Link.'" "A what?" "You know, Forward's deck. The Deck." "Gotcha"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1 strength counter on an icebreaker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I think that if i'd been spending my time and money on any other breaker than Dahlia, my girlfriend would have understood."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: Prevent one or more of your other installed resources from being trashed. Use this ability only during the Corp 's turn.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T1:SimplyAnnounce{prevent an installed resource form being trashed}

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Vienna counter. Each Vienna counter allows you to access an additional card from HQ whenever you access cards from HQ.

property.name: Rules
property.value: After each successful run on Archives, HQ, or R&D, put a Socket counter in that data fort. Socket counter from Archives, Socket counter from HQ, and Socket counter from R&D: Give the Corp a Pipe counter. Each Pipe counter causes the Corp to forgo an action at the start of each of its turns.

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:Infect1virusSocket-Targeted-atData Fort-ofOpponent||A0B0G0T0:Remove1virusSocket-Targeted-atData Fort-ofOpponent-isCost$$Infect1virusPipe-onOpponent

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run. Prevent up to 7 damage during that run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lost another one." "So?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: [T]: +3 link. Use this ability only after you and the Corp have revealed how much each of you spent on the trace attempt.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I use a lot more explosive than I need, so they think it's a random structure hit. There's no way to track those down, so they usually don't bother."

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Break wall subroutine. [2]: +1 strength. Whenever you break a wall subroutine with Wrecking Ball, lose [1] from a stealth card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'Form of a Dwarf!' 'Shape of a Pile Driver!' I'm sick of this Proteus crap. Gimme a good, old-fashioned hammer program any day."

property.name: AutoAction
property.value: A0B0G0T0:SimplyAnnounce{break wall subroutine}||A0B2G0T0:Put4PlusOne
